description:
Anything can happen in Neo San Francisco: monster attacks, retro-future tech, town-thumping tunes! When these monsters threaten to harsh the vibe of this city, DJ pumps up the jams to transform Muteki into Muteking, the dancing hero. The invaders can’t keep up when this superhero hits the dance floor. The classic anime retakes the stage!

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: ムテキング・ザ・ダンシング・ヒーロー

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Transgender
tags.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

title.native: とんでも戦士ムテキング

Orange Range is a 5-member Japanese alternative rock band, based in Okinawa. Formed in 2001, the band began with Spice Music and later signed with Sony Music Japan's gr8! records division in 2003.  (Source: Wikipedia)

Reol is a composer and utaite, known for working with GigaP and Okiku, after working with each other for awhile, they created the unit group RΞOL in 2015,  the group has disbanded in 2017 due to creative differences, all three are still in contact and are working individually with their own projects. 
Is currently signed under Sony Music Entertainment Japan as a solo artist. She started creating and releasing music onto Nico Nico Douga and YouTube in late 2012.

Giga is a Japanese singer, VOCALOID producer, lyricist, arranger, and composer. He made his debut as a VOCALOID producer in 2009 and as a singer in 2012. He is also a former member of the Japanese electronic pop co-ed band RΞOL.

Giga is a Japanese singer, VOCALOID producer, lyricist, arranger, and composer. He made his debut as a VOCALOID producer in 2009 and as a singer in 2012. He is also a former member of the Japanese electronic pop co-ed band RΞOL.
[Website](http://rinneyoshida.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rinne1211) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rinne1211/)

[Website](http://mariyat.co.jp/)

A Japanese singer and songwriter who helped pioneer the style of Japanese adult-oriented rock/soft rock dubbed "city pop." Mariya Takeuchi has produced the majority of her music since the '70s. She is well known for interpreting "Plastic Love", contributing to the revival in interest in the City Pop genre in recent years.

Takeuchi is one of the most commercially successful Japanese solo artists in the history of the Japanese album chart, having sold over 16 million records, and has received several accolades. She is the oldest singer to have achieved a No. 1 single.

Married to [Tatsurou Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114944/Tatsurou-Yamashita). They have one daughter.

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Profile (SUPA LOVE)](http://supalove.com/category/introduction/miyajima-junko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junko_Miyajima)

__Miyajima Junko__ is a lyricist affiliated with SUPA LOVE.

A Japanese singer and songwriter who helped pioneer the style of Japanese adult-oriented rock/soft rock dubbed "city pop." Mariya Takeuchi has produced the majority of her music since the '70s. She is well known for interpreting "Plastic Love", contributing to the revival in interest in the City Pop genre in recent years.

Takeuchi is one of the most commercially successful Japanese solo artists in the history of the Japanese album chart, having sold over 16 million records, and has received several accolades. She is the oldest singer to have achieved a No. 1 single.

Married to [Tatsurou Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114944/Tatsurou-Yamashita). They have one daughter.
